Text:
bubblegun

No, it's the BBC broadcast so they are the subtitles that they ordered/were given.
Oh, sorry you mean capture, then yes, from the website.

Alright then, super delux, thank you.  And now, would you mind telling me how you got the files so small.  I downloaded from the TV and two episodes are almsot 4 Gb.  So how do you shrink them?  Or do I understand you download with iPlayer?  Anyway, thanks so much... I watched them with the dutch subs bought series 2 but nothing beats english... super delux, thanks!! email?

Looked at get iplayer, doesn't make much sense to me but will work at it.  In the meantime, I downloaded and burned Day one and two of Forbrydelsen... super quality for such small files. I won't bother uploading Day 7 and 8... Anyway, again, thanks so much.  
I also see you have other series I like.  Any chance any of the Wallander's - BBC4 last year? I only managed to get the last four.
Anyway, thanks so much...
A/V 10 - Happy. Thank you! -  Robston  - keep eem coming! more please:)
Just heard about this show. Thanks 4 the upload
I too just heard about it and can't wait to start watching -- very many thanks indeed.

I'm a bit confused. I can't find how many episodes there in season1. IMDB lists 20. I see 18 uploaded to TPB. 

How many episodes in the series that begin with this episode?

I'm a bit confused. I can't find how many episodes there are in season1. IMDB lists 20. I see 18 uploaded to TPB. 

How many episodes are in the series that begin with this episode?
There are 20 episodes in Season One.
I am an American. Give me something good to watch. I am hungry. Thank you.
Thanks Robston! Downloaded & watched the whole series. Excellent - the series itself, the quality of the download & the subs!!

i am currently watching its english remake by aMC and i am hooked to it....
i have read reviews that this one is much better than the original...
i will get episode 1 and see it myself...
thanks Robston for the upload
